tool_description: Validates directory structures against predefined rules, checks for naming conventions, permission consistency, and structural integrity.

directory_paths.description: List of directory paths to validate

validation_rules.description: Validation rules to apply: naming, permissions, structure, metadata, accessibility

strict_mode.description: Whether to apply strict validation rules

error_messages: Invalid validation rules: Use one or more of [naming, permissions, structure, metadata, accessibility].
Directory not found: One or more specified directories do not exist for validation.
Validation configuration error: Invalid combination of validation rules specified.
usage: Provide directory_paths and validation_rules array, optionally enable strict_mode. The tool validates directories and returns detailed compliance reports.

passed_directories.description: List of directories that passed all validation rules

failed_directories.description: List of directories that failed validation

validation_errors.description: Detailed list of validation errors found
